message:
Do You have an idea.
Do You want 2 win 20,000$
Join Us @ Google Cloud Developer Challenge 2013
https://www.facebook.com/events/253860841427808/?ref=notif&notif_t=plan_admin_added
story: Akram Hassan shared GDG Alexandria's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Google Cloud Developer Challenge 2013
caption: Google Cloud Developer Challenge 2013
description:
Welcome to the Google Cloud Developer Challenge! It's time to show the world what you can do with the Google Cloud Platform, with a chance to win $20,000
------------------------------------------------------------
Join our free demonstration sessions Saturday 5 October 2013 through this form: http://j.mp/gcdc_2013
------------------------------------------------------------

Location:
--------------
Arab Academy for Science & Technology, Miami Branch, Building B, Hall B


Sponsors:
--------------
CMT, AAST - FMA Student Chapter (Arab Academy for Science, Technology)
https://www.facebook.com/pages/CMT-AAST-FMA-Student-Chapter/162416210514437


Agenda:
-----------
10:00 AM - 10:30 AM : Registration
10:30 AM - 10:45 AM : Sponsor Talk
10:45 AM - 11:15 AM : About Google Cloud Developer Challenge
11:15 AM - 12:15 PM : Cloud & Virtualization - Sherief Selim
12:15 PM - 01:15 PM : Google Cloud platform - Sherief Selim
01:15 PM - 02:00 PM : Coffee Break
02:00 PM - 03:00 PM : Management & Entrepreneurship
03:00 PM - 04:00 PM : Fun Sessions


What is the Google Cloud Developer Challenge?
Developers in 6 regions across the world will win prizes that include Android devices and up to $20,000 USD. We are also highlighting innovations of students and female developers!
All you have to do is build and submit an amazing application in one of these categories:

* Enterprise/Small Business Solutions , Education, Not for Profit
* Social / Personal Productivity/Games / Fun

A winner will be chosen for each category, in each region -- 12 prizes in total.


Want to start hacking?
-----------------------------
You can develop applications on the Google Cloud Platform using any of Python, Java, PHP and Go programming languages.
Join one of our Google Cloud Developer Launch events and Devfests across Africa, Asia and Latin America.
You can also apply for $2,000 worth of Google Cloud Platform credit here using the promo code: gcpdc-in.
The first round of submissions closes November 21, 2013.


Resources
--------------
About: http://www.google.com/events/gcdc2013/about.html
FAQ: http://www.google.com/events/gcdc2013/faq.html
More: http://www.google.com/events/gcdc2013/resources.html
